title.value: Pre-Training and Fine-Tuning Generative Flow Networks
title.justification: The title clearly indicates the focus on both pre-training and fine-tuning GFlowNets.
title.quote: Pre-Training and Fine-Tuning Generative Flow Networks

description: This paper proposes a novel approach for pre-training Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets) in a reward-free, unsupervised manner. The authors introduce an outcome-conditioned GFlowNet (OC-GFN) which learns to reach targeted outcomes in a self-supervised way, enabling efficient adaptation to downstream tasks. The paper demonstrates significant improvements in sample diversity and efficiency through extensive experiments in domains like GridWorld and biological sequence design tasks.

type.justification: The paper includes extensive experimental results validating the efficacy of the proposed approach.
type.quote: Extensive experimental results validate the efficacy of our approach, demonstrating the effectiveness of pre-training the OC-GFN, and its ability to swiftly adapt to downstream tasks and discover modes more efficiently.

research_field.justification: The paper is focused on a novel approach for pre-training and fine-tuning deep learning models, specifically Generative Flow Networks.
research_field.quote: In this paper, we propose a novel method for reward-free unsupervised pre-training of GFlowNets.

sub_research_field.justification: The focus on Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets) and improving their training and adaptation processes aligns this paper with the sub-field of Generative Models in deep learning.
sub_research_field.quote: Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets) are amortized samplers that learn stochastic policies to sequentially generate compositional objects from a given unnormalized reward distribution.

name.justification: Specifically mentioned as the key model introduced in the paper.
name.quote: We propose a novel method for reward-free unsupervised pre-training of GFlowNets. We formulate the problem of pre-training GFlowNets as a self-supervised problem of learning an outcome-conditioned GFlowNet (OC-GFN).

type.justification: The paper explicitly mentions that OC-GFN is a type of Generative Flow Network that is outcome-conditioned.
type.quote: We propose a novel method for reward-free unsupervised pre-training of GFlowNets. We formulate the problem of pre-training GFlowNets as a self-supervised problem of learning an outcome-conditioned GFlowNet (OC-GFN).

name.justification: The dataset is used for evaluating the proposed pre-training and fine-tuning strategy.
name.quote: Extensive experimental results validate the efficacy of our approach, demonstrating the effectiveness of pre-training the OC-GFN... on the GridWorld domain.
